displayName.english: For upgrading the pig pen to level 1!

displayName.english: For upgrading the pig pen to level 3!

displayName.english: For upgrading the pig pen to level 5!

displayName.russian: За пятый уровень свинарника!

displayName.english: For catching five products in midair!
displayName.german: Fange fünf Produkten in der Luft!

displayName.english: For earning one star on every level!

displayName.english: For earning two stars on every level!

displayName.english: For completing five levels without clicking on any products!
